DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy etoricoxib treatment osteoarthritis knee .
DOC.criteria: At least 40 year age clinical diagnosis Osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee 6 month prior study entry ( ARA class I , II , III ) . Positive therapeutic effect prior NSAID therapy . Worsening symptom upon withdrawal prior treatment . With exception OA , otherwise good health Weight 280 pound ( male female ) . Recent , sustain use gastroprotective agent . History arthroscopy affect knee within 6 month prior study entry . History acute ligamentous meniscal injury study joint within previous 2 year .
